name: unaltered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
that has stayed the same or not been changed: The museum has remained unaltered for a very long time. All the documents that you present must be unaltered originals certified by the issuing agency. Compare
unalterable
US (of an animal) that has not been castrated or spayed (= had part of its sex organs removed), or that has not had another body part changed or removed: Owners must pay a $7 registration fee for neutered pets and $30 for unaltered pets. The ears of this breed are traditionally cropped, although some modern dogs are unaltered.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is believed that comets represent the most unaltered material in the solar system.A complete and mostly unaltered collection of her poetry became available for the first time in 1955.
